Vrinda Malhotra
I was nominated by Navya Sinha for the ‪#bookbucketchallenge‬ (sorry Udai Bhardwaj you were a bit too late). So here is my list of my ten favourite books ever.
1. Harry Potter series by J.K. Rowling(*bows)
2. Percy Jackson series by Rick Riordan
3.Mediator and Size and Airhead series by Meg Cabot
4. His Dark Materials by Philip Pullman
5. 1984 and Animal Farm by George Orwell
6. Daddy Long Legs by Jean Webster
7. Sherlock Holmes (all books) by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle
8. All Dan Brown books...

September 2005: eBay buys Skype for $2.6 billion. After 4 years of unfulfilled expectations, 2009: Skype is sold for $1.9 billion, to a group of private investors.
